kw.name: GIVEN I am on AirFrance HomePage
Get First Connected Device
kw.msg: List of devices attached: seq serial state 1 LGH815e4eec017 device

kw.name: Get Device Language
kw.msg: List of devices attached: seq serial state 1 LGH815e4eec017 device

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Library Search Order
kw.doc: Sets the resolution order to use when a name matches multiple keywords.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server.

kw.name: At Launch, Refuse to Update the App
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

arguments.arg: The Popup to Update the Application did not display

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: At Launch, Skip the login Step
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: At Launch, Confirm the UK Language
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Check that I’m on the AirFrance HomePage
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: THEN I can select "Flight News" from HomePage
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Check that I’m on the “Flight news” Page
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
